text: The flag of Zapopan () It is colored green and gold and the coat of arms in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the width of the stripes. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. ==Design and symbolism== Name Color HEX Code Green #009c3b Yellow #F1BF00 ==Related pages== * Flags of municipalities of Mexico * Zapopan * Flag of Jalisco ==References== Zapopan Category:Flags with coats of arms Category:Bicolour flags
title: Flag of Zapopan
